caption.p: Variations on NP-31 and NP-450 residues affected viral growth kinetics. A549 cells were infected with reverse genetics with different amino acid composition as indicated at ( a) MOI of 1 and ( b)( c) MOI of 0.01 at 37 °C. At the selected time points, viruses were harvested and examined by plaque assay in MDCK cells. The one-way ANOVA with Tukey post-test was performed; * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001
